__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: This will call the initial build a new instance. It should be called only once from within the script. All subsequent calls to controllers should be done through $this->add($path).

reset.name: reset

get_request.name: get_request
get_request.summary: Returns the current controller's route, i.e as demanded by the client.

say_root.name: say_root
say_root.summary: Returns the current controller's root drrectory.

get_controller.name: get_controller
get_controller.summary: Returns the current controller's file's name.

get_current_dir.name: get_current_dir
get_current_dir.summary: Returns the current controller's file's name.

render.name: render
render.summary: This directly renders content with arbitrary values using the existing Mustache engine.

arguments.name: view
arguments.description: The data model to fill the view with

is_cli.name: is_cli
is_cli.summary: Returns true if called from CLI/Cron, false otherwise

reroute.name: reroute
reroute.summary: This will reroute a controller to another one seemlessly. Chainable

incl.name: incl
incl.summary: This will include a file from within the controller's path. Chainable

add_script.name: add_script
add_script.summary: This will add the given string to the script property, and create it if needed. Chainable

register_plugin_classes.name: register_plugin_classes

process.name: process
process.summary: This will launch the controller in a new function.
process.description: It is publicly launched through check().

get_js.name: get_js
get_js.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

get_js_group.name: get_js_group
get_js_group.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

get_view_group.name: get_view_group
get_view_group.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

get_css.name: get_css
get_css.summary: This will get a CSS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

get_less.name: get_less
get_less.summary: This will get and compile a LESS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

add_css.name: add_css
add_css.summary: This will get a CSS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

add_less.name: add_less
add_less.summary: This will get and compile a LESS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

add_js.name: add_js
add_js.summary: This will add a javascript view to $this->obj->script

add_js_group.name: add_js_group
add_js_group.summary: This will add a javascript view to $this->obj->script

get_plugin_from_component.name: get_plugin_from_component
get_plugin_from_component.summary: Retrieves the plugin's name from the component's name if any

get_component.name: get_component

js_data.name: js_data

get_view.name: get_view

custom_plugin_view.name: custom_plugin_view

combo.name: combo

get_content.name: get_content
get_content.summary: This will get a the content of a file located within the data path

get_dir.name: get_dir
get_dir.summary: This will return the path to the directory of the current controller

set_prepath.name: set_prepath

get_model.name: get_model
get_model.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

get_cached_model.name: get_cached_model
get_cached_model.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

delete_cached_model.name: delete_cached_model
delete_cached_model.summary: This will delete the cached model. There is no order for the arguments.

set_cached_model.name: set_cached_model
set_cached_model.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

add_inc.name: add_inc
add_inc.summary: Adds a property to the MVC object inc if it has not been declared.

has_arguments.name: has_arguments

has_data.name: has_data
has_data.summary: Checks if data exists or if a specific index exists in the data

has_content.name: has_content
has_content.summary: Checks if there is ny HTML content in the object

get_rendered.name: get_rendered
get_rendered.summary: Returns the rendered result from the current mvc if successufully processed
get_rendered.description: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

description_parts.content: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

get_script.name: get_script
get_script.summary: Returns the rendered result from the current mvc if successufully processed
get_script.description: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

description_parts.content: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

set_data.name: set_data
set_data.summary: Sets the data. Chainable. Should be useless as $this->data is public. Chainable.

add_data.name: add_data
add_data.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

add.name: add
add.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

add_to_obj.name: add_to_obj
add_to_obj.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

view_exists.name: view_exists
view_exists.summary: Checks whether the given view exists or not.

model_exists.name: model_exists
model_exists.summary: Checks whether the given model exists or not.

plugin_data_path.name: plugin_data_path

doc.description: The db connection if accepted by the mvc class.

tags.description: The mode of the controller (dom, cli...), which will determine its route

doc.description: All the parts of the path requested
All the parts of the path requested which are not part of the controller path
A numeric indexed array of the files sent through POST (different from native)
An external object that can be filled after the object creation and can be used as a global with the function add_inc
